players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and she's mafia. She killed Bob. Vote her!"
Diana: "I think Charlie may be lying about the investigation. He could be mafia. I’m not sure I killed Bob; maybe someone else did. I have no reason to target anyone else."
You: "Charlie, mafia wouldn't mention an investigation. Vote Charlie."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I investigated Diana, she's mafia. Bob was killed at night. Vote her."
Diana: "..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and she's mafia. She killed Bob. Vote her!"
Diana: "I think Charlie may be lying about the investigation. He could be mafia. I’m not sure I killed Bob; maybe someone else did. I have no reason to target anyone else."
Alice: "Charlie, mafia wouldn't mention an investigation. Vote Charlie."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Diana, she's mafia. Bob was killed at night. Vote her."
Diana: "..."

You: "I think Charlie may be lying about the investigation. He could be mafia. I’m not sure I killed Bob; maybe someone else did. I have no reason to target anyone else."
Alice: "Charlie, mafia wouldn't mention an investigation. Vote Charlie."
